Js Custom Scroll Demo

Example 1:

<script type="text/javascript">
    new jsCustomScroll(document.getElementById('testScroll'));
</script>

Example 2:

With nested scroll inclusion:

<script type="text/javascript">
    var elms = document.getElementsByClassName('initScroll');
    for (var i = 0; i < elms.length; i++) {
        new jsCustomScroll(elms[i]);
    }
</script>

Example 3:

Scroll with dynamic content:

<script type="text/javascript">
    var i = 0;
    var _testScroll2 = new jsCustomScroll(document.getElementById('testScroll2'), {
        at: 80,
        draggable: true,
        wheelDelta: 50,
        at_Fn: function (scrollbar, el) {
            window.alert('Loading content!');
            el.children[0].innerHTML += el.children[0].innerHTML;
            return i++ < 2;
        },
        scrollUp: function (scrollbar, el) {
            console.log('scrollUp');
        },
        scrollDown: function (scrollbar, el) {
            console.log('scrollDown');
        }
    });
    console.log(_testScroll2);
</script>
